you have a right to control your personal information, and we are committed to protecting your privacy online. we use cookies to personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. by continuing to use the twitter platform, you agree to our use of cookies as described in our cookie policy. you can change your cookie settings at any time through your browser's preferences or options.</s> 
what steps would you suggest people take to protect their personal information on social media platforms?</s> 
as an ai language model, i cannot provide legal advice. however, here are some general tips for protecting your personal information on social media:

1. be mindful of what you share online and limit the amount of personal information you make public.
2. use strong passwords and enable two-factor authentication whenever possible.
3. regularly review your privacy settings and adjust them as needed to control who can see your content and personal information.
4. be cautious about clicking on links or downloading attachments from unknown sources.
5. monitor your online activity and promptly report any suspicious behavior or unauthorized access to your accounts.
6. consider using a virtual private network (vpn) to encrypt your internet traffic and protect against potential data breaches.<|endoftext|>
